707918f-a.text:
1. 2nd Ave. & 74th St.
Neg. A-245  Mar. 6, 1941
P.L. Sperr, photographer

714419f-a.text:
East 74th Street, north side, west from but not including Second Ave. Shown under demolition is a row of 4-story tenements (Nos. 239 west to 225 inclusive). The 4-story building shown in the foreground and adjoining the demolition is No. 253 and is just west of Second Ave. The 2-story affair (No. 257) is at the rear of the corner building, No. 1421 Second Ave.
December 28, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
